title: CodeGuard
shortDescription: Site & Database Backups. Protect your site today!
longDescription: CodeGuard is the leading provider of website and database backup services and is trusted by some of the largest hosting providers in the world, providing incremental backups at 99.9% levels of reliability for over 400,000 websites and databases globally.
instructions: After creating your CodeGuard account, follow the instructions in the application for enabling backups for your website and database.
author: CodeGuard Inc.

categories.title: Recommended for All Sites
categories.description: Apps that are recommended for all sites.

categories.title: Security
categories.description: Apps which make your site safer and protect you from threats.

message.description: The fastest, most reliable website backup service - which tracks all of your changes daily.
message.helpvalue: Hey, no action on your side is required after this point. Soon you'll receive an email with further details.
message.title: CodeGuard
